item.description:
As in past summers, WBRU and Dunkin Donuts' are sponsoring a set of Free concerts at Waterplace park.  This week it's local Latin Rock group Santa Mamba.

Come out, enjoy what looks to be a great afternoon, perhaps dance a little salsa in the grass!

Show is free to all.

 

Please Note: Tom will be hosting this event, so memorize his picture instead of mine...8)

I (host) will be wearing a lime green guayabera shirt and will try to find a location toward the bottom or middle toward the stage.  Probably will try to arrive a little early.  May be a popular concert.  Group members can discuss grabbing a drink after the concert, but I personally don't have a late night planned.

 

WBRU Dunkin' Donuts Summer Concert Series: Santa Mamba Waterplace Park
Providence, RI Map to Waterplace Park

Waterplace Park in Downtown Providence

7:30 PM

FREE AND ALL AGES

Featuring: Santa Mamba

Official Concert Afterparty at Sullivan's Rhode directly following the show
18+
item.name: Santa Mamba Performance @ Waterplace Park
